about_the_game: The Sojourn - Upgrade to Digital Deluxe offers exclusive access behind the scenes of this unforgettable journey. Immerse yourself in two official artbooks - collections of concept art, level designs and screenshots all carefully selected by the developers. Then, exclusive to this edition, go beyond the game with Equilibrium. Instrumental to the design and direction of The Sojourn - this early playable prototype is an exclusive bonus only for this edition.

short_description: The Sojourn is a first-person puzzle game set in an immersive colour-drenched world of light and darkness. Think your way through dozens of puzzles as you traverse parallel worlds, and discover the game's background with unique playable content in the Deluxe edition.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
